pageProduct.name: Slim Secrets Protein Pud With Chia Salted Caramel 115g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

The perfect combination of salt & caramel in a creamy ready-to-eat protein pudding that won't weigh you down, so you never miss out on dessert again. Our gluten free, Salted Caramel Protein Puds with chia not only taste delicious and creamy but are a good source of protein, calcium and fibre to help you feel fuller for longer and keep your bones strong and healthy. The lid even includes a spoon so you're ready to satisfy that sweet craving whenever it strikes. But don't take our word for it... the proof is in the pudding!

Gluten free
Good source of protein
Good source of calcium
Good source of fibre
Low fat
No artificial colours, flavours or sweeteners
No added preservatives
No GMO ingredients

Warnings

Contain milk

Common Uses

Between meals as a snack option, after a workout for a protein boost, a low cal. Low carb dessert or used as part of a recipe

Ingredients

Water, Milk Solids, Thickeners (1442, 415), Dietary Fibre (Inulin), Sugar, Chia Seeds (1%), Natural Flavours, Salt (0.5%), Natural Colours (Lutein, Caramelised Sugar), Mineral Salt (341), Natural Sweeteners (Steviol Glycosides, Thaumatin)
